flawed_nl_solution:
The third dig site was dated from the year 8400 / 2 = <<8400/2=42000.0>>42000.0 BC.
Thus, the first dig site was dated from the year 42000.0 - 3700 = <<42000.0-3700=38300.0>>38300.0 BC.
The second dig site was 352 years older, so it was dated from the year 38300.0 + 352 = <<38300.0+352=38652.0>>38652.0 BC.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4200.0, not 42000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
